title: How to Make a Hot Fudge Sundae Cake

steps.headline: Combine the sugar, flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt in a medium sized bowl.
Add and mix in the oil, milk, and vanilla.
steps.description: Mix thoroughly until smooth. Sprinkle and fold the nuts into the mixture.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into a 9 x 9 x 2 (23 x 23 x 5 cm) ungreased square pan.
steps.description: Use the side of a knife or spatula to spread it evenly.

steps.headline: Sprinkle the brown sugar and cocoa over the batter mixture.
Carefully pour the hot water over everything in the pan.
Serve the dessert.
steps.description: Add a medium sized cake piece to a dessert dish. Layer the ice cream on top and garnish with any treat you'd like.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF or 180ºC.  Combine the sugar, flour, cocoa, baking powder, and salt in a medium sized bowl.  Add and mix in the oil, milk, and vanilla. Mix thoroughly until smooth. Sprinkle and fold the nuts into the mixture. Pour the mixture into a 9 x 9 x 2 (23 x 23 x 5 cm) ungreased square pan. Use the side of a knife or spatula to spread it evenly. Sprinkle the brown sugar and cocoa over the batter mixture.  Carefully pour the hot water over everything in the pan.  Bake for at least 40 minutes.  Serve the dessert. Add a medium sized cake piece to a dessert dish. Layer the ice cream on top and garnish with any treat you'd like.
